bug.author: leezu
bug.summary: Website defaults to master API documentation
bug.description: Website shows API documentation for master version by default. That's not useful, as most users will run the stable MXNet version and will be confused by breaking changes in MXNet 2 website. Reference: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/issues/18428>#18428</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: cc: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/connorgoggins>@connorgoggins</denchmark-link> can we default to the latest stable branch?

Please note that the traffic to 1.6 version website only account for 0.54% of total traffic according to Google Analytics.( from 01/2020 to present ). The problem seems to be the API docs website failed to clearly showing the users what version of docs they are seeing and what is the stable version. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sandeep-krishnamurthy>@sandeep-krishnamurthy</denchmark-link>
